actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to the assignment and transportation of pupils to public schools.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - States that the Constitution shall not be construed to require that pupils be assigned or transported to public schools on the bases of their race, color, religion, or national origin.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to the assignment and transportation of pupils to public schools.
